com.ui.event
Class ComponentSelectionEvent

java.lang.Object
  java.util.EventObject
      com.ui.event.BaseEvent
          com.ui.event.ComponentSelectionEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ComponentItemDoubleClickedEvent, ComponentItemSelectedEvent
public class ComponentSelectionEvent
extends BaseEvent

A common notification source containing information pertaining to item selection based actions relative to a given component.

Author:
rterrell
See Also:

Constructor Detail

ComponentSelectionEvent

public ComponentSelectionEvent(java.lang.Object source,
                               java.lang.Object selectedItem,
                               int eventId)
Create a ComponentSelectionEvent initialized with the source of the event, the item selected in the grid, and the event id.

Parameters:
source - the object that triggered the event
selectedItem - an object corresponding to the table model item currently selected.
eventId - the id of the event.

ComponentSelectionEvent

public ComponentSelectionEvent(java.lang.Object source,
                               java.util.List grid,
                               int eventId)
Create a ComponentSelectionEvent initialized with the source of the event, the grid's List component, and the event id.

Parameters:
source - the object that triggered the event
grid - a reference to the List contained within the grid component
eventId - the id of the event.
